pageContext.claim: “As you know I'm under audit. It turned out that I am under audit....I am under audit. No person in their right mind would release prior to working out to deal with the IRS and I'll go a step further. I'm treated very badly by the IRS. They treat me very, very badly. You have people in there from previous administrations. They treat me very badly, but we're under audit. It's very routine in many ways, but we're under audit.”
pageContext.analysis: Every president, as a matter of course, has their tax returns audited. Every president since Nixon has publicly released their tax returns even as the audit is ongoing.
